# orcasecurity_user_preferences (Data Source)

Fetches custom widget IDs from Orca via the user preferences API. The data source calls `GET /api/user_preferences?view_type=customs_widgets` and returns both organization-level and user-level custom widgets for the authenticated user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "orcasecurity_user_preferences" "widgets" {}

# List of widget IDs (strings)
output "custom_widget_ids" {
  value = data.orcasecurity_user_preferences.widgets.custom_widget_ids
}

# List of objects with id and name
output "widgets" {
  value = data.orcasecurity_user_preferences.widgets.custom_widgets
}
```

Example output:

```
widgets = tolist([
  {
    id   = "7a3df944-1d23-4415-95d1-ba650ab50446"
    name = "All Cloud Assets"
  },
])
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `custom_widget_ids` (List of String) List of custom widget IDs (preference IDs with view_type 'customs_widgets').
- `custom_widgets` (Attributes List) List of custom widgets with id and name. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--custom_widgets))

<a id="nestedatt--custom_widgets"></a>

### Nested Schema for `custom_widgets`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Custom widget ID (preference ID).
- `name` (String) Custom widget name.
